question: As per economic survey 2017-18, which Indian State is the highest merchandise importer/exporter?
explanation: As per Economy Survey 2017-18, five States Maharashtra, Gujarat, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu and Telangana account for 70 % of India\'s exports. Out of which, Maharashtra ranks first and account for 22.2 percent of share in export, Gujarat ranks second with 17.2 percent of the share, Karnataka ranks third with 12.7 percent share, Tamil Nadu at fourth place with 11.6 percent and Telangana at fifth place with 6.4 percent share. Also when it comes to inter-state trade, the five largest exporting states are Maharashtra, Gujarat, Haryana, Tamil Nadu and Karnataka. Also, in case of inter-state trade, the five largest importing states are Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, Uttar Pradesh, Karnataka and Gujarat.
